snippet: Fox Sports will learn this season if it was a good move to replace Joe Buck’s longtime M.L.B. broadcast partner, Tim McCarver, with Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.
abstract: Fox Sports will learn this season if it was a good move to replace Joe Buck’s longtime MLB broadcast partner Tim McCarver with Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.
lead_paragraph: Fox Sports will learn this season if it was a good move to replace Joe Buck’s longtime M.L.B. broadcast partner, Tim McCarver, with Harold Reynolds and Tom Verducci.

headline.main: Fox Sees Chemistry in New Baseball Booth
headline.print_headline: Fox Sees Chemistry in New Booth Trio
